definitions.definition: ( now regional ) A bag or wallet . [from 13 c.]
A bag containing letters to be delivered by post.
The (physical) material conveyed by the postal service. [from 17 c.]
examples: Don't forget to pick up the mail on your way.

subdefinitions.definition: ( chiefly US , uncountable ) The letters , parcels , etc. delivered to a particular address or person. [from 19 c.]
examples: It should be in your mail today, unless the post office lost it!

definitions.definition: ( dated ) A stagecoach, train or ship that delivers such post.
The postal service or system in general. [from 17 c.]
examples: He decided to send his declaration by mail .

definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) Electronic mail , e-mail : a computer network –based service for sending, storing, and forwarding electronic messages. [from 20 c.]
examples: Yahoo Mail has been providing mail service since 1997.

definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) Email messages conceived in bulk (as with the analogous sense of physical mail ).
examples: You've got mail [old audio clip announcing new email in the 1990s-2000s]

definitions.definition: ( countable , especially India ) An email message .
examples: Please look through those mails and confirm whether you received the one about scheduling.

definitions.definition: A trunk, box, or bag, in which clothing, etc., may be carried.

main_definition: ( now regional ) A bag or wallet . [from 13 c.]
secondary_definitions: A bag containing letters to be delivered by post.
The (physical) material conveyed by the postal service. [from 17 c.]
( dated ) A stagecoach, train or ship that delivers such post.
The postal service or system in general. [from 17 c.]
( uncountable ) Electronic mail , e-mail : a computer network –based service for sending, storing, and forwarding electronic messages. [from 20 c.]
( uncountable ) Email messages conceived in bulk (as with the analogous sense of physical mail ).
( countable , especially India ) An email message .
A trunk, box, or bag, in which clothing, etc., may be carried.

definitions.definition: ( uncountable , history ) Armour consisting of metal rings linked together.
( uncountable , by extension , now fiction , fantasy ) Armour consisting of small plates linked together.
( nautical ) A contrivance of interlinked rings, for rubbing off the loose hemp on lines and white cordage.
Any hard protective covering of an animal, as the scales and plates of reptiles, shell of a lobster, etc.
( obsolete , rare ) A spot on a bird's feather ; by extension, a spotted feather .

main_definition: ( uncountable , history ) Armour consisting of metal rings linked together.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , by extension , now fiction , fantasy ) Armour consisting of small plates linked together.
( nautical ) A contrivance of interlinked rings, for rubbing off the loose hemp on lines and white cordage.
Any hard protective covering of an animal, as the scales and plates of reptiles, shell of a lobster, etc.
( obsolete , rare ) A spot on a bird's feather ; by extension, a spotted feather .

definitions.definition: An old French coin worth half a denier .

main_definition: ( historical ) An old French coin worth half a denier .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly Scotland ) A monetary payment or tribute.
